alert.note: Alert for Ashland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 16 at 3:32PM CDT until October 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the higher elevations around Mellen and locations southeast of Mellen in eastern Ashland County. * WHERE...Ashland County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
